pages.text: You'll need to make sure to $(#00a800)stay hydrated$() if you want to remain healthy. Your body's natural ability to recover is $(d)impeded when you're too thirsty$(). You can make any number of different beverages - $(#00a8a8)tea$(), $(#00a8a8)juice$(), $(#00a8a8)cocoa$(), but the obvious go-to is $(#00a8a8)water$().

You can drink any water you find, but if you want to be safe about it, you'll need to $(6)purify it first$(). You can $(6)boil water$() in a $(#00a8a8)Furnace$(), for example. Unpurified water can cause you to $(d)be even thirstier$().
